description: The name "embodies Manx spirit" and "signifies national pride", the island's ferry operator says.
title: Manxman chosen as name of new Isle of Man ferry
title_page: Manxman chosen as name of new Isle of Man ferry - BBC News
maintext: The vessel, due to start service in 2023, will be the third to hold the name in the Steam Packet Company's 190-year history.
